item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, February 25, 2025 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Claude 3.7 Sonnet and Claude Code (1350 points | 594 comments)
2. It's still worth blogging in the age of AI (91 points | 51 comments)
3. Everyone at NSF overseeing the Platforms for Wireless Experimentation is gone (191 points | 141 comments)
4. DeepSeek open source DeepEP – library for MoE training and Inference (28 points | 5 comments)
5. "The closer to the train station, the worse the kebab" – a "study" (210 points | 204 comments)
6. Judge: US gov't violated privacy law by disclosing personal data to DOGE (49 points | 31 comments)
7. Show HN: I built an app to stop me doomscrolling by touching grass (982 points | 240 comments)
8. While the world builds AI Agents, I'm just building calculators (13 points | 11 comments)
9. Introduction to Stochastic Calculus (327 points | 63 comments)
10. Closing the "green gap": energy savings from the math of the landscape function (68 points | 30 comments)
11. Breaking into apartment buildings in five minutes on my phone (294 points | 183 comments)
12. The best way to use text embeddings portably is with Parquet and Polars (141 points | 38 comments)
13. AI cracks superbug problem in two days that took scientists years (189 points | 88 comments)
14. Launch HN: SubImage (YC W25) – See your infra from an attacker's perspective (98 points | 22 comments)
15. Microsoft cancels leases for AI data centers, analyst says (342 points | 280 comments)
16. Writing a DSL in Lua (2015) (60 points | 14 comments)
17. Show HN: I made a site to tell the time in corporate (194 points | 94 comments)
18. Neut Programming Language (129 points | 33 comments)
19. US Space Force reveals first look at secretive X-37B space plane in orbit (5 points | 1 comment)
20. Student refines 100-year-old math problem, expanding wind energy possibilities (106 points | 14 comments)
21. Modular forms, the 'fifth fundamental operation' of math (2023) (64 points | 4 comments)
22. Right to Repair laws have now been introduced in all 50 us states (411 points | 126 comments)
23. Keeping our free tier sustainable by preventing abuse (67 points | 27 comments)
24. Micro Journal: Distraction-Free Writing Device (77 points | 33 comments)
25. Clean Code vs. A Philosophy Of Software Design (79 points | 45 comments)
26. Apple says it will add 20k jobs, spend $500B, produce AI servers in US (541 points | 528 comments)
27. Ashby (YC W19) Is Hiring Principal Product Engineers ( | hide)
28. Is this the simplest (and most surprising) sorting algorithm ever? (2021) (100 points | 92 comments)
29. Why does target="_blank" have an underscore in front? (2024) (252 points | 180 comments)
30. Show HN: Electro – A hyper-fast Windows image viewer with a built-in terminal (38 points | 23 comments)
